name: EC2Tool
modelDescription: Execute AWS EC2 read-only and info commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: DescribeInstances {command:'DescribeInstances', params:{InstanceIds:['i-123']}}. DescribeInstanceTypes {command:'DescribeInstanceTypes', params:{InstanceTypes:['t3.micro']}}. DescribeNetworkInterfaces {command:'DescribeNetworkInterfaces', params:{Filters:[{Name:'vpc-id',Values:['vpc-123']}]}}. DescribeRouteTables {command:'DescribeRouteTables', params:{Filters:[{Name:'vpc-id',Values:['vpc-123']}]}}. GetConsoleOutput {command:'GetConsoleOutput', params:{InstanceId:'i-123'}}.
userDescription: Query EC2 instances, instance types, images, networking (VPCs, subnets, route tables, internet/NAT gateways, network interfaces, security groups), and console data

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Use native EC2 API field names (e.g., InstanceIds, Filters, Owners).

InstanceId.description: Single instance ID (Used by: GetConsoleOutput (Required), GetPasswordData (Required))

InstanceIds.description: List of instance IDs (Used by: DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus)

Filters.description: EC2 filter array with Name and Values[] (Used by: DescribeAddresses, DescribeAvailabilityZones, DescribeFlowLogs, DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus, DescribeInstanceTypeOfferings, DescribeInstanceTypes, DescribeInternetGateways, DescribeKeyPairs, DescribeLaunchTemplates, DescribeNatGateways, DescribeNetworkInterfaces, DescribeRouteTables, DescribeSecurityGroupRules, DescribeSecurityGroups, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeSubnets, DescribeTags, DescribeTransitGateways, DescribeVpcEndpoints, DescribeVpcPeeringConnections, DescribeVpcs)

DryRun.description: Validate permissions without running the request (Used by: DescribeAddresses, DescribeAvailabilityZones, DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus, DescribeKeyPairs, DescribeRegions, DescribeSecurityGroups, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeSubnets, DescribeTags, DescribeVolumes, DescribeVpcs)

MaxResults.description: Pagination: maximum results (Used by: DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeVolumes)

NextToken.description: Pagination token for next page (Used by: DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeVolumes)

LocationType.description: Location type for instance type offerings (Used by: DescribeInstanceTypeOfferings)

GroupIds.description: Security group IDs (Used by: DescribeSecurityGroupRules, DescribeSecurityGroups)

VpcPeeringConnectionIds.description: VPC peering connection IDs (Used by: DescribeVpcPeeringConnections)

StartTime.description: Start time for spot price history (Used by: DescribeSpotPriceHistory)

EndTime.description: End time for spot price history (Used by: DescribeSpotPriceHistory)

ProductDescriptions.description: Product descriptions for spot price history (Used by: DescribeSpotPriceHistory)
